Giacomo Rebonato

Maker, web developer, musician

ContactsAbout

Why all of this?

I wanted to create my presence on the web outside from social network web sites.

Fine... who are you?

Didn't you see the header? I have been doing full stack web development for many years.
Now I still enjoy doing it as much as I enjoy to run away from my screen to do something real.

Why this site looks weird?

I am the kind of developer with discutible knowledge and taste in design.
I use on a daily basis sofisticated libraries for UI and logic... I liked the wild freedom of doing everything from scratch.

Are you happy with it?

I surely am... and I don't aim to show off.
I felt like the good old times when I was just learning html and css.
Even without much more, the web can always be a beatiful communication platform and a space for creativity.

This is my footer!
